talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Did you hear?! My mom was fishing in the
sky!<sp:5:1:0> She's awesome like that!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Once I can climb waterfalls, I'm gonna
scarf as much hearty bass as I want on
the sky islands!
Heh... <sp:5:0:0>I'm drooling now.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Now that the water's clean, everything's
back to normal. <sp:5:0:0>My family is too!

<sp:3:0:2:0501>My dad's working hard to fix up the
domain.<sp:5:1:0> And my mom is fishing.

Oh, and Keye is following me around,
of course.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>As for me, I'm just playing and having lots
of fun!<sp:5:1:0> As a kid, that's my job, after all.
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease_00>I'm hungry! <sp:5:0:0>I wonder if my mom got us
some yummy fish.

My dad gets reeeally worried when she
goes fishing.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Far as I can tell, it's because he loooves
her so much, hee-hee!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>I wonder if my mom got us some yummy
fish. Mmmm, I hope so!

Um, one day I'm gonna catch a huuuge
fish all by myself and brag to everyone,
and then they'll all be SO impressed! Heh!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>I'm just playing and having lots of fun!<sp:5:1:0>
As a kid, that's my job, after all.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Keye is making worried faces, just like
dad... I wonder why?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy>Someday, when I'm a master sky
fisherman, I'm gonna eat all the fish
I catch all by myself!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Then I'll be a master of fishing AND
a master of eating.<sp:5:0:0> Yeah! Hee-hee!
